text: Bozeman is a city in and the seat of Gallatin County, Montana, United States. It is located in southwest Montana. The 2020 census put Bozeman's population at 53,293, making it the fourth largest city in Montana. Bozeman is home to Montana State University. The local newspaper is the Bozeman Daily Chronicle, and the city is served by Bozeman Yellowstone International Airport. Points of interest are the Museum of the Rockies and Bridger Bowl Ski Area. ==References== Category:Cities in Montana Category:County seats in Montana
title: Bozeman, Montana
